root.title: Potential Registry Reconnaissance Via PowerShell Script
root.description: Detects PowerShell scripts with potential registry reconnaissance capabilities. Adversaries may interact with the Windows registry to gather information about the system credentials, configuration, and installed software.
root.author: frack113

logsource.definition: Requirements: Script Block Logging must be enabled

falsepositives.item: Due to the nature of the script block, the matching of the string could sometimes result in a false positive. Use this rule to hunt for potential malicious or suspicious scripts.
